actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement law to increase the retirement benefits of referees in bankruptcy.

summary.text: Provides for the deduction of 10 percent of the basic pay of a referee in bankruptcy, for purposes of Civil Service Retirement. Specifies that the annuity of a referee in bankruptcy shall be computed by multiplying 2 1/2 percent of his average pay by the years of his service as a referee. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8334(a)(1), 8339(c)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement law to increase the retirement benefits of referees in bankruptcy.
